thread.section_title: MobileFun.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MobileFun.com | www.mobilefun.com
thread.title: J W

author: J W
title: J W
text: MobilFun was the only company which carried the cell phone case with a delivery date (because it was so new on the market) to an affordable price. (Every other website was at least twice as much) When the manufacturer delayed the date they emailed me right away with the new date and a possibility to choose a case they had in stock. They were very friendly and apologized authentically for the delay. Upon arrival they shipped it to me so that I had my case the next day. What a great customer service! The prices as well as the variety of brand new products is absolutely awesome. Thank you MobilFun!
